## DerivAPI

**Extends DerivAPIBasic**

The main class of the DerivAPI module. This class extends the minimum
functionality provided by the [DerivAPIBasic][15] adding abstract objects
that can be used to read data and interact with the API.

### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][78]** For options details see: [DerivAPIBasic][15]

### Examples

```javascript
// Returns an abstract ticks object
const ticks = api.ticks('R_100');

// Subscribe to updates on the ticks object
ticks.onUpdate().subscribe(console.log);

// Read the last ticks available in the default range
const ticksHistory = ticks.list;

// Read the last 100 ticks until yesterday
const olderHistory = await ticks.history({ count: 100, end: new Date(yesterday) });
```

### tickStream

Provides a ticks stream and a list of available ticks

#### Parameters

-   `options` **([String][79] \| [TicksParam][80])** symbol or a ticks parameter object

Returns **[TickStream][81]** 

### candleStream

Provides a list of available candles with the default granularity

#### Parameters

-   `options` **([String][79] \| [CandlesParam][82])** symbol or a candles parameter object

Returns **[CandleStream][83]** 

### contract

A contract object with latest status and ability to buy/sell

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[ContractsParam][84]** parameters defining the contract

Returns **[Contract][85]** 

### underlying

An underlying object, including contract groups, pip size, etc.

#### Parameters

-   `symbol` **[String][79]** The underlying symbol

Returns **[Underlying][86]** 

### account

An account object, including loginid, balance, contracts, etc.

#### Parameters

-   `token` **[String][79]** Token to create the account with

Returns **[Account][87]** 

### assets

Trading assets including multiple underlyings and trading times

Returns **[Assets][88]** 

## DerivAPIBasic

**Extends DerivAPICalls**

The minimum functionality provided by DerivAPI, provides direct calls to the
API.
`api.cache` is available if you want to use the cached data (see [Cache][25])

### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][78]**  (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `options.connection` **[WebSocket][89]?** A ready to use connection
    -   `options.endpoint` **[String][79]** API server to connect to (optional, default `'blue.binaryws.com'`)
    -   `options.appId` **[Number][90]** Application ID of the API user (optional, default `1`)
    -   `options.lang` **[String][79]** Language of the API communication (optional, default `'EN'`)

### Examples

```javascript
const apiFromOpenConnection = new DerivAPI({ connection });
const apiFromEndpoint = new DerivAPI({ endpoint: 'ws.binaryws.com', appId: 1234 });
```

### subscribeWithCallback

Subscribe and call the given callback on each response

#### Parameters

-   `request` **[Object][78]** A request object acceptable by the API
-   `callback` **[Function][91]** A callback to call on every new response

#### Examples

```javascript
await api.subscribeWithCallback({ ticks: 'R_100' }, console.log)
```

Returns **[Promise][92]** Resolves to the first response or is rejected with an error

### subscribe

Subscribe to a given request, returns a stream of new responses,
Errors should be handled by the user of the stream

#### Parameters

-   `request` **[Object][78]** A request object acceptable by the API

#### Examples

```javascript
const ticks = api.subscribe({ ticks: 'R_100' });
ticks.subscribe(console.log) // Print every new tick
```

Returns **Observable** An RxJS Observable

### onClose

Reconnects to the API in case of connection error, unless connection is
passed as an argument, in that case reconnecting should be handled in the
API user side.

## Cache

**Extends DerivAPICalls**

Cache - An in-memory cache used to prevent sending redundant requests to the
API

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** API instance to get data that is not cached

### Examples

```javascript
// Read the latest active symbols
const symbols = await api.activeSymbols();

// Read the data from cache if available
const cachedSymbols = await api.cache.activeSymbols();
```

## Underlying

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for an underlying

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 
-   `symbol` **[String][79]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const underlying = await api.underlying('R_100');

const pipSized = underlying.pipSizedValue(123.1);

// Same as api.tickStream(symbol);
const tickStream = underlying.tickStream();

if (underlying.isOpen) await contract.buy();
```

### pipSizedValue

Returns the pipSized display of the value in string

#### Parameters

-   `value`  

### tickStream

Shortcut for api.tickStream(symbol)

### candleStream

Shortcut for api.candleStream(symbol)

## Immutable

An abstract class for immutable objects

## Account

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for user accounts

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 
-   `token` **[String][79]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const account = await api.accounts(yourToken);

// Returns the open contracts of this account
const openContracts = account.openContracts();

const siblings = account.siblings;

// Switches the API account to the first sibling
siblings[0].switch();
```

### siblings

Returns **[Account][87]** all the sibling accounts

### openContracts

Returns **[Array][94]&lt;[Contract][85]>** A list of all open contracts

### closedContracts

Returns **[Array][94]&lt;[Contract][85]>** A list of all closed contracts

### switch

Switches to this account

## Assets

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for trading assets

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const assets = await api.assets();

// Get the current open markets
const openMarkets = assets.openMarkets;

const tradingTimes = assets.tradingTimes;
```

### openMarkets

Returns the current [Underlying][10] list for open markets

## CandlesParam

Type: [Object][78]

### Properties

-   `granularity` **[Number][90]** Granularity in seconds
-   `count` **[Number][90]** Number of candles returned by history
-   `symbol` **[String][79]** Symbol of the candles

## CandleStream

**Extends Stream**

An abstract class for Candles information

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 
-   `options` **[CandlesParam][82]?** 

### history

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[CandlesParam][82]?** 

Returns **[Array][94]&lt;Candle>** 

## Stream

An abstract class for stream objects

## Range

Type: [Object][78]

### Properties

-   `start` **([Number][90] \| [Date][95])** An epoch in seconds or a Date object
-   `end` **([Number][90] \| [Date][95])**  An epoch in seconds or a Date object
-   `count` **[Number][90]** Number of ticks returned by history

## TicksParam

Type: [Object][78]

### Properties

-   `range` **[Range][96]** A chunk of history to return with start and end time
-   `symbol` **[String][79]** The ticks symbol

## TickStream

**Extends Stream**

Abstract class for ticks

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 
-   `options` **[TicksParam][80]**  (optional, default `{}`)

### onUpdate

Called with every new tick in the stream

### list

A list of Tick objects

### history

#### Parameters

-   `range` **[Range][96]?** 

Returns **[Array][94]&lt;[Tick][97]>** 

## defaultRange

Default range of ticks: 1000 latest ticks

## Tick

Type: [Object][78]

### Properties

-   `time` **[CustomDate][98]** 
-   `quote` **[MarketValue][99]** 
-   `ask` **[MarketValue][99]** 
-   `bid` **[MarketValue][99]** 

## Tick

A wrapper class for Tick

### Parameters

-   `$0` **[Object][78]** 
    -   `$0.epoch`  
    -   `$0.quote`  
    -   `$0.ask`  
    -   `$0.bid`  
-   `pip`  

## CustomDate

**Extends Date**

A custom date object to provide more flexibility to dates

## MarketValue

Keeps a market value and pip size

### Parameters

-   `value`  
-   `pip`  

### pipSize

Returns the pip size

### pipSized

Returns the pipsized value

## ContractsParam

Type: [Object][78]

### Properties

-   `contractType` **[String][79]** 
-   `amount` **[Number][90]** 
-   `barrier` **[String][79]** 
-   `barrier2` **[String][79]** 
-   `dateExpiry` **([Number][90] \| [Date][95])** epoch in seconds or [Date][100]
-   `dateStart` **([Number][90] \| [Date][95])** epoch in seconds or [Date][100]
-   `Currency` **[String][79]?** Default is the account currency
-   `basis` **[String][79]** stake or payout
-   `duration` **([Number][90] \| [String][79])** duration with unit or duration in number
-   `durationUnit` **[String][79]?** duration unit, required if duration is number
-   `productType` **[String][79]?** 'multi_barrier' or 'basic'

## Contract

**Extends Stream**

Abstract class for contracts

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][93]** 
-   `options` **[ContractsParam][84]**
